definition: being the only one, and nothing more
details:
adjective
- being the only one
= synonyms: sole
- exclusive of anyone or anything else
= synonyms: alone
adverb
- and nothing more
= synonyms: just
- without any others being included or involved
= synonyms: entirely
- with nevertheless the final result
= example: with nevertheless the final result
- in the final outcome
= example: in the final outcome
- as recently as
= example: as recently as
- except that
- never except when
= example: never except when
= synonyms: only if
